Title: Judy Garland
Notes: Syndicated television short covering Garland 's career through A Star is Born , glossing over any mention of Garland 's problems

Title: Judy/The Ultra Secret
Notes: The Garland segment was one of two in the episode . The Ultra Secret was a segment about World War II code-breaking

Title: Rainbow
Notes: Biopic focusing on Garland 's early years . Andrea McArdle played Garland

Title: Judy Garland : The Concert Years
Notes: Nominated for an Emmy award for Outstanding Informational Special

Title: Life with Judy Garland : Me and My Shadows
Notes: Two-part biopic based on the Luft memoir . Garland as a child was played by Tammy Blanchard and Judy Davis played Garland as an adult . The mini-series was nominated for 13 Emmys , and won five , including awards to both Blanchard and Davis

Title: Judy Garland : By Myself
Notes: Won two Emmy awards for Outstanding Picture Editing for Nonfiction Programming and Outstanding Writing for Nonfiction Programming ; nominated for three more

Title: Judy
Notes: Theatrical film directed by Rupert Goold starring Ren√©e Zellweger as Garland , who earned an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress
